This place has DELICIOUS sandwiches at a GREAT price. While Bo de B is the go-to spot for picking your own ingredients in a bocadillo, Conesa is the place to go for order-off-the-menu bocadillos! these sandwiches are delicious & at right around 3-4€ you really can't go wrong just picking a random one to try out, although I highly recommend the "lomo y queso" (pork & cheese) bocadillo! This place can get pretty crowded inside so I suggest getting your food & then walking directly diagonal across the plaça & sitting on one of the benches in the next plaça! only real drawback to this spot is its touristy location so it can be a bit of a wait to get a sandwich during peak hours!
